question: Would you like to work a lot with people instead of working in front of a computer all day?
Do you see yourself in creative and artistic work?
Would you like to focus on individual elements instead of designing the whole thing?

answers.description: Graphic Designer is a person who not only cares about the high quality of the graphics, but is also responsible for the visual communication. It cares for the graphics to convey the relevant content and arouse the desired emotions.

question: Are you interested in topics related to human - computer interaction ?

answers.description: Product Design is a person who creates concepts for a new product and conducts research to ensure that the most beneficial solutions for the project are found.

question: Do you prefer to create the vision of a product rather than making sure it is executed properly on time?

answers.description: Product Manager is a person who takes care of the entire product, from its creation to sale, who is responsible for the quality, price and market analysis.

question: Do you want to code on a daily basis in your work?

answers.description: UX Designer is a person who designs the users experience to increase their satisfaction from using product.

question: Are the user experiences much more important to you than the aestehetic aspects?

answers.description: UX Researcher is a person who conducts research and looks for the best solutions to catch product bugs and shortcoming that from the user's point of view, need to be fixed.
UX Designer is a person who designs the users experience to increase their satisfaction from using product.

question: Do you prefer to focus on the entire project with its logistics than on a single fragment?

answers.description: Project Manager is a perosn that mainly manages the project, but not only takes care of good planning, but also its execution. This person has to manage budget, time and monitors risks. What is more, in this job it is important to have a very good attitude to people.
Scrum Master is a person that is responsible for the success of scrum of the group. This person must support its team and remove obstacles that arise by caring for all memebers of the project.

question: Do you prefer to create solutions for mobile devices rather than for the web?

answers.description: Mobile Developer is a person that specializes in the developemnt and improvement of software system that is adapted to mobile devices. Possible paths are working on iOS or Android system.

question: Do you want to focus only on the visual aspects of the website or also on issues related to the performance and capacity ?

answers.description: Front-end Developer is a person responsible for the appearance and development of the user interface of the websites for many devices.

Web Developer is a person that specializes in websites and web applications development. What is more, part of their job is to taking care of proper functioning of website form programming point of view. For them it is important to know programming languages like HTML / CSS, C #, Ruby or PHP.
